introduction: Hilda y Cristina cruzan un cementerio, les han dicho que comenzará una invasión. Hilton, un sepulturero ilegal, observa preocupado. Si invaden, no tendrá espacio para seguir cavando tumbas. La invasión y el cementerio están cerca y los muertos parecen haber conseguido lo que ellas desean: un hogar.Hilda and Cristina have been told that a settlement will begin near the cementery. Hilton, an illegal gravedigger, watches with concern. If they invade, he won’t have space to digging graves. The settlement and the cemetery are very close, and the dead seem to have achieved what they desire: a home.
